text: Volodymyr Nechayev (; 4 August 1950) is a former professional Soviet football defender and coach. Nechayev started at 12 in the sports school (DYuSSh) of SKA Odessa.Volodymyr Nechayev: "Football is my life, and "Chornomorets" will always be my team" (Владимир НЕЧАЕВ: «Футбол — моя жизнь, а „Черноморец“ всегда будет моей командой»). FC Chornomorets Odesa. 13 June 2016 With Chornomorets and Pakhtakor, Nechayev played some 166 games at the Soviet Top League. ==References == ==External links== * Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:People from Bilhorod-Dnistrovskyi Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Chornomorets Odesa players Category:SKA Odessa players Category:Pakhtakor Tashkent FK players Category:FC Elektrometalurh-NZF Nikopol players Category:Soviet Top League players Category:Soviet football managers Category:Ukrainian football managers Category:FC Elektrometalurh Nikopol managers Category:FC Polissya Zhytomyr managers Category:FC Transmash Mogilev managers Category:SC Olkom Melitopol managers Category:FC Enerhiya Yuzhnoukrainsk managers Category:Ukrainian expatriate football managers Category:Expatriate football managers in Belarus Category:Association football defenders
title: Volodymyr Nechayev
